title: Markets Update: Do Investors Think the S&P 500 Has Bottomed Out?
description: Anne Marie Darling of Goldman Sachs’ Global Markets Division analyzes the S&P 500 index’s historically fast fall into bear market territory and shares results of the April Marquee QuickPoll, a survey of institutional clients which found that about half of respondents don’t believe lows have been set yet.
itunes:author: Goldman Sachs
